class havoc.autoval.lib.test_base.TestBase[source]Â¶

Bases: object

__init__()[source]Â¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

_create_log_directories(host)[source]Â¶
dut_logdir â> Log dir at DUT and achieve at the end the test. Used to

store critical data on the test server during test.

dut_tmpdir â> tmp dir at DUT and deleted at the end of the test.

store non critical data on the test server during test

control_server_logdir â> Log dir at control server and achieve at the

end the test. store any critical data on the control server.

control_server_tmpdir â> tmp dir at control server and deleted at the

end the of the test. store non critical data on the control server.

tmpdir â> tmp dir at glusterfs (resultsdir) and deleted at the end

the test.

system_log_dir â> system_log directory to save system specific logs.

_initialize_test_control_settings(test_control)[source]Â¶

Get common test control settings

_setup_execute()[source]Â¶

We should always set oob mode before creating our first host because OOB.mode variable is used

  • to choose the method (OpenBMC or HWC) to determine host type

  • to create OOB objects (HWC) within OOB.py
